page.title: 04My Best Pet Ever.
page.content: One morning when I woke and came downstairs Sooty was wanting his meat. So were our three other cats.I gave them their food and let them all out. Then I got ready to play out I got the key for the shed got my bike then went for Andrew Cunningham.A lot of hours later when I went in,I asked my mum where Sooty was."Isn't he outside ?" she said.I didn't know, but I had to go to bed then. The next morning there was still no sign of him. The day passed and I went sadly to bed, however before I fell asleep Lynne appeared with Sooty. She said that she had found him locked in the coal bunker. He must have been there for two days. My mum came up to tell me and we gave him a big bowl of meat. We also give milk to a stray cat that we call Smokey, but he is still very thin and skinny.by D.Cunningham.
